multiHqlReportIndex.hql: select projectid,networktype,platformid,ytime, sum(totalflow) totalflow, sum(vodflow) vodflow, sum(livetvflow) livetvflow, (sum(avgvodflow)/count(avgvodflow)) avgvodflow, (sum(avglivetvflow)/count(avglivetvflow)) avglivetvflow from (select projectid, if(t.networktype is null, 'ALL', t.networktype) networktype, if(t.platformid is null, 'ALL', t.platformid) platformid, substr(t.dtime,0,4) ytime, totalflow, vodflow, livetvflow, avgvodflow, avglivetvflow from video.t_video_client_flow_analyse_dy_hbase t where substr(t.dtime, 0, 4) > '{STARTTIME}' and substr(t.dtime, 0, 4) < '{ENDTIME}' and substr(t.dtime, 0, 4) < from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(date_add(from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(t.dtime, 'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-MM-dd'),1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy') ) tt group by projectid,networktype,platformid,ytime

select projectid, networktype, platformid, ytime, (totalflow / activeusers) douflow from (select t1.projectid,t1.networktype,t1.platformid,t1.ytime,t1.totalflow, t2.activeusers from (select projectid, networktype, platformid, ytime, totalflow from video.t_video_client_flow_analyse_y_hbase t where t.ytime > '{STARTTIME}' and t.ytime < '{ENDTIME}') t1 left join (select projectid,dtime,sum(activeusers) activeusers from video.t_mid_video_sdk_current_d t where t.date > '{STARTTIME}' and t.date < '{ENDTIME}' and t.activitychannelid = 'ALL' and t.platformid = 'ALL' and t.activityid = 'ALL' and substr(t.date, 0, 4) < from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(date_add(from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(t.date, 'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-MM-dd'),1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy') group by projectid,dtime ) t2 on t1.projectid = t2.projectid and t1.ytime = substr(t2.dtime, 0, 4) ) tt group by projectid, networktype, platformid, ytime, (totalflow / activeusers)
